image_concept: Professional AI and human collaboration for enterprise automation
style: Photorealistic stock photography with professional studio lighting

composition.layout: Clean, centered composition with negative space
composition.focal_point: Robot hand and human hand interaction symbolizing AI-human collaboration

visual_elements.primary_subject: Sleek, modern robotic hand with metallic silver/white finish and blue LED accents reaching toward or touching a human hand
visual_elements.background: Pure white or very light gray gradient background, completely clean with no distractions
visual_elements.lighting: Professional studio lighting with soft shadows, bright and clean aesthetic
visual_elements.additional_elements: Subtle blue holographic interface elements or data visualization floating near the interaction point

technical_requirements.background_treatment: Clean white background with subtle gradient, no texture
technical_requirements.edge_treatment: Clean edges, no vignetting, professional crop

mood_and_tone.avoid: Sci-fi dystopian, aggressive, overly futuristic, cluttered backgrounds

reference_style: Adobe Stock professional business photography, similar to enterprise SaaS marketing imagery
